name: Pramuka: The Game
description:
When a group of boy scouts (Pramuka) is going out camping, they were split up on the way! Now the scout leader has to use his boy scout skills to save them. Traverse the woods, climb hills, and fight bad guys to save your scout members in this 2D platformer game!

Features
  • Play 3 levels of platforming fun!
  • Interact with scout guides to learn what happened to your friends!
  • Collect aloe vera to heal and seek bonfires to save your progress
  • Defeat enemies and save your friends!
How To Play:
  • Use the arrow keys to move and space to jump
  • Press 'E' to interact with scout guides and ropes
  • Press 'F' to heal yourself
  • Press 'D' to attack enemies
Credits:
  • Nikola Ziljian Revo Devara – Game Designer
  • Ivan Nurdien Awanta Nugraha – Environment and Background Artist
  • Calvin Ekklesias Gasra Sitorus – UI Artist and Sound Engineer
  • Mochammad Fikry Ardiansyah – Character Artist
  • Josiah Ken Aprillio (Myself) – Programmer

This game was created in part of our 4th-semester Practice Class
